鏒字的基本解释

鏒
sǎn
金鏒。
铁器貌。

鏒
qiāo
古同“缲”，一种缝纽法。

鏒
càn
锄。

鏒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǎn］
［《玉篇》思感切］
(1)用金泥涂抹。
(2)指金泥。
[②]［qiāo］
［《集韻》千遥切，平宵，清。］
同“繰3”。

鏒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏒； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1319第23
【玉篇】思感切，音糂。金鏒也。【五音集韻】鐵器之貌。　又【集韻】千遙切，音?。以箴紩衣。通作繰。　又五音集韻】七紺切，音謲。鋤也。

鏒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鏒字的起名意思

暂无。

鏒
Basic explanation of words
鏒
sǎn
Jin Huan.
Iron appearance.
鏒
qiāo
In ancient times, "缲" is a kind of stitching method.
鏒
càn
hoe.
鏒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sǎn］
["Jade Pian" Thoughts and Feelings]
(1) Smear with golden mud.
(2) Refers to golden mud.
[②]［qiāo］
["Ji Yun" Qianyao cut, evening, and Qing. ]
Same as "缲3".
鏒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏒; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1319 Page 23
【Jade articles】Thinking and feeling sharp, sound glutinous rice. Jin Chu also. 【Pentagram Rhyme】The appearance of ironware.　[Jiyun] Qianyao cut, sound?. In order to protect the clothes. The pass is made 缲.　Another Five-tone Collection Rhyme】Seven cyan cut, sound 謲. Hoe too.
鏒

Name meaning

sǎn, qiāo, càn
